بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
أقر دينار بن سليمن المودن ببلجسوق أقر إقرار له ø
طوع راغب وطالب وأشهد على نفسه في صحّة
من عقله وجواز أقر أمر طائعا غــير مكــره ولا مــجبر ولا مضّهد
ولا جاهلا بما أقرّ فيه أنّ عليه وعنده وقبله
وفي ذمّته وخالص ماله دينا ثابتا وحقّا لازما
له لرمه من ø الإقرار به لزمزوم بن نضر نضر من القمح
الطّيّب الصّل النّصيل السّالم من العلث أربعة أرادب
وثلث يقوم بذلك في آخر صفر صيفة من ø سنة ستّة وعشرين
بغير مدافعة ولا ممانعــة ولا احتجاج بــحــجّة دون
الخروج من الــمبــلــغ المذكــور عــلــى تمــامه وكماله وبــذلك
أقر وأشهد على نفسه في العشر الثّاني من محرّم
سنة سبع وعشرين وخمسمائة
شهدت عليه بذلك وكتب
إسمعيل بن زيد بن أحمد بن عبد اللّه

Au nom de Dieu clément et miséricordieux! In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Dînâr b. Sulaimân, the Muezzin in Bulǧusûq, has acknowledged, (viz.) he has acknowledged for him(self) Dīnār Ibn Sulaymān, le muezzin à Bulǧusūq, a reconnu,
de bon gré, (le) désirant et demandant, et pris à témoin, étant dans la plénitude de sa faculté voluntarily, desiring (and) demanding (it) and has called witnesses to testify to his obligation, he being in a state of sound
mentale, il a reconnu, de bon gré, n[on] cont[raint, ni for]cé, ni maltraité, mind: he has acknowledged voluntarily, without compulsion and not against his will and not under constraint,
and not ignorant of what he has acknowledged herein, viz. that he owes, has in his possession, is in debt ni ignorant de ce qu’[il a reconnu, qu’il a à son débit comme dette],
and under obligation for, with his undiminished property, as an obligatory debt and an obligation incumbent sous sa protection et de son bien intégral, une dette valide et une obligation l’engageant
à reconnaître à Zamzūm Ibn Naṣr comme blé upon him on the basis of the acknowledgment thereto, to Zamzûm b. Naṣr of good, cleansed
bon, nettoyé et sans mélange, quatre a[rde]bs wheat, free from any admixture, four artabas
and a third (of an artaba) with which he will present himself on the last Ṣafar of the year (five hundred and) twenty six et un tiers; il (lui) livrera cela à la fin de ṣafar de l’année vingt-six (sic),
sans chercher d’ajournement, ni de prétexte de re[fu]s, ni d’invocation d’aucun [ar]gument, mais plutôt without any delay, or pretext for refusal, or by bringing forward any argument beyond
paiera la som[me men]ti[onée entièremnt et] complètement. the paying of the afore-mentioned amount comple[tely and] fully; thereto
he has acknowledged and has called witnesses to testify to his obligation in the second decade of Muḥarram Il a reconnu cela et pris à témoin dans la deuxième décade de muḥarram
de l’année cinq cent vingt-sept. of the year five hundred and twenty seven.
I have testified thereto for him and J’ai témoigné de cela à son débit, et (l’)écrivit
Ismaʿîl b. Zaid b. Aḥmad b. ʿAbdallâh has written (it). Ismāʿīl Ibn Zayd Ibn Aḥmad Ibn ʿAbd Allāh.
